Climate change is a challenge beyond carbon dioxide. Methane is about 80 times more effective at trapping heat in the atmosphere than carbon dioxide over a 20-year period. This has led to a global response, with 155 countries now committed to the Global Methane Pledge, with a target of a 30% reduction in global methane emissions by 2030. Our Coating Services provide high-quality precision optical filters, which is crucial for the early detection of atmospheric gases, especially methane. We therefore not only strive to minimise our own emissions, but also help our partners detect and reduce methane release from their operations. Find out more about our infrared filters at: eom.umicore.com

We are proud to be able to realize this deposition in a newly developed process with our established platinum #electrolytes that is #safe for humans and the environment. Find out how we are driving forward the energy transition with our #green and #cost-#optimized plating process for porous transport layers (#PTL) and bipolar plates (#BPL): https://lnkd.in/e3ps_2vb #umicore #MetalDepositionSolutions #Electroplating #letsGoForZero #H2

Bloomberg exchanged with our CEO Bart Sap about the complexity and the extent of the car industry's -- and society's -- transformation from combustion engines to electric powertrains. The interview followed the publication of Umicore‚Äôs first-half 2024 results and an update on the ongoing review of our Battery Materials division, which suffers from the overall EV slowdown. Next to opportunities, there are plenty of risks in this still-emerging and capital-intense industry which requires the build-up of a supply chain. However, the upshot is: electrification will come! Read the full article: https://lnkd.in/efk8MFVh

Today we announced our half-year results: Group revenues for the first half of the year amounted to ‚Ç¨ 1.8 billion and adjusted EBITDA amounted to ‚Ç¨ 393 million. In recent months, short- and medium-term growth projections for the electric vehicles market have been scaled back substantially, significantly affecting Umicore‚Äôs Battery Materials business. Today, we share the elements of how we are adjusting to this new reality.
